item.title: Frugooscape Redone!
item.dc:creator: @pokemonn pokemonn
item.description:
@pokemonn wrote:

[quote=“Aetoc, post:36, topic:454482”][quote author=pokemonn link=topic=557350.msg4085080#msg4085080 date=1345744479]

I remember I was highest ranked on both total level and combat level, lololol
together with some guy named jakebadrill, *in the non-spawn world
such a good times that i even remember names after all that time.

anyways, you gained experience after killing a monster not for a hit, and in the beginning everything was multi,
so people just let you killing the monster but took the last hit for the xp, i remember all the rage lolol
we were all in the vulcano killing lesser demons for it, they gave like 350xp if i remeber right which was about the fastest to train (speed/amount ratio)

Fastest exp for me was either Tzok cave, Chaos ele, or where you had to run on that hill to kill the troll guys or w.e they were.

OT: Are you going to be making both realms cheat/non-cheat?

yes, but cheat first but if i can get alot of people to actually play, then i will have both
[/quote]

I think you should be able to get a good playerbase, frugooscape was a good experience for alot of people and it’ll be a change from
most servers.[/quote]

i hope so!

Read full topic

item.title: Frugooscape Redone!
item.dc:creator: @olivierscape olivierscape
item.description:
@olivierscape wrote:

Which Frugooscape are you talking about ? There was a runescape-like server and a sandbox server.

Read full topic

item.title: Frugooscape Redone!
item.dc:creator: @pokemonn pokemonn
item.description:
@pokemonn wrote:

[quote=“olivierscape, post:26, topic:454482”]Hmmm… Spawned at lumbridge. There was many custom items (Golden whip, etc) and items that didn’t work were automatically buried. Range didn’t count as a combat stat, so you could do some pretty crazy stuff. For example, a guy with 80 range and 60 hp is only around level 30. There was a nice dueling system, a strange quest and lots of players…
Training was done by using objects (Tightening sewer pipes, searching bags etc.)
And that’s pretty much all I remember. The community was good because of it’s players though.[/quote]

i dont remember the rang thing or the customs but ill add them

Read full topic

item.title: Frugooscape Redone!
item.dc:creator: @olivierscape olivierscape
item.description:
@olivierscape wrote:

Hmmm… Spawned at lumbridge. There was many custom items (Golden whip, etc) and items that didn’t work were automatically buried. Range didn’t count as a combat stat, so you could do some pretty crazy stuff. For example, a guy with 80 range and 60 hp is only around level 30. There was a nice dueling system, a strange quest and lots of players…
Training was done by using objects (Tightening sewer pipes, searching bags etc.)
And that’s pretty much all I remember. The community was good because of it’s players though.

Read full topic

item.title: Frugooscape Redone!
item.dc:creator: @olivierscape olivierscape
item.description:
@olivierscape wrote:

I miss Frugooscape so much, I remember that lame quest that we all did, so fun. I loved ranging at the varrock castle, and the best part was dueling with nubs xD. I also used glitches to go on Tutorial Island and such… The good times…

R.I.P FrugooScape

Read full topic

item.title: Frugooscape Redone!
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

I remember Frugooscape as a spawn server, the home was in varrock and everyone will go to east side of wildy to pk, they all used the zamorak mage attack, not too sure what it is, but that’s my memory of frugoo.

OT: GoodLuck and I’d like for this to flourish.

Read full topic
